newsitem.title: UK: Soymeal soars on UK meals and feeds market.
newsitem.headline: Soymeal soars on UK meals and feeds market.

text.p: Soaring high protein soymeal prices frightened most buyers away on the UK meals and feeds market on Friday,
"Buyers don't want to know at these levels," said one broker.
Ex-mill high protein soymeal rose by as much as eight stg a tonne following the sharply higher close in Chicago.
Ex-store prices were up to seven stg up.
Rapemeal was unchanged for new crop while northern mills were one stg one for old crop.
The remainder of the market was unchanged.
